name: Sanities Lament Episode 5
description:
Notes:

If using the exe play at 1024x768 Windowed for optiminal UI.

You are trapped by a strange entity that toys with you and you must try to help your friends escape. A nightmare? A dream? Or reality. Trying to manage your high school life and friends in between dreams.

A pretty early version of what I expect to be a prominent dungeon crawling feature in this weekly series.

Cheers,

Endemic
